subject: Adobe Dreamweaver only $59
body:
Death is a Dialogue between, the Spirit and the Dust.

Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount.

You can fool too many of the people too much of the time.

Whoever gossips to you will gossip about you.

Life is a progress from want to want, not from enjoyment to enjoyment.

When I look into the future, it is so bright it burns my eyes.

Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.

Come on, you sons of bitches! Do you want to live forever?

Amusement to an observing mind is study.

My appointed work is to awaken the divine nature that is within.

Hope on, and save yourself for prosperous times.

He who knows only his own side of the case, knows little of that.

It is quality rather than quantity that matters.
